volunteering.pageDescription: Not every reward is monetary. These volunteer and purpose-driven roles exist to make a difference — for people, for the planet, and for the future. Whether it's planting trees, helping local communities, or contributing your skills to social causes, every action here counts toward something bigger than ourselves.
volunteering.opportunitiesDescription: {{count}} ways to make a positive impact in your community and beyond.
volunteering.noOpportunities: No volunteer opportunities available at the moment
volunteering.checkBackSoon: Check back soon for new ways to make a difference in your community.
volunteering.makeADifferenceDescription: Join us in creating meaningful change through volunteer work that makes a real difference in communities and causes you care about.
volunteering.defaultDescription: Make a meaningful impact through volunteer work that contributes to environmental sustainability, community development, and social justice initiatives.

request.title: Request Mentorship
request.subtitle: Send a mentorship request to {{mentorName}}

request.formDescription: Tell the mentor about your goals and what you hope to achieve through mentorship.
request.messagePlaceholder: Hi, I'm interested in learning React and TypeScript. I have some experience with JavaScript but would love to get better at building scalable applications...
request.messageHint: Introduce yourself and explain why you're interested in mentorship with this mentor.
request.goalsPlaceholder:
1. Master React hooks and state management
2. Learn TypeScript best practices
3. Improve system design skills
4. Prepare for senior developer interviews

request.resumeHint: Share your resume to help the mentor understand your background better.
